text:
@DailyCaller I see. Chicago murder spike is due to coronavirus.

Um, can we attribute the killing  of George Floyd to coronavirus as well, instead of “400 years of oppression and systemic racism”?

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
